definition: A pronoun used to refer to a previously mentioned noun, indicating that it is the same person or thing being referred to. It is commonly used to maintain consistency and avoid repetition in written and spoken discourse.

examples.german: Er hat denselben Pullover wie ich.
examples.english: He has the same sweater as me.

examples.german: Wir haben denselben Geschmack in Musik.
examples.english: We have the same taste in music.
They both wear the same ring.

examples.german: Ich habe denselben Film gestern gesehen.
examples.english: I watched the same movie yesterday.

examples.german: Die beiden Autos sind derselbe Typ.
examples.english: The two cars are the same model.
